Proxy.label: CSV Reader
Proxy.name: CSVReaderCore

Documentation.long_help: Reads a comma-separated values file into a 1D rectilinear grid.

Proxy.Documentation: The CSV reader reads a comma-separated values file into a 1D rectilinear grid. If the file was saved using the CSVWriter, then the rectilinear grid's points and point data can be restored as well as the cell data. Otherwise all the data in the CSV file is treated as cell data. The default file extension is .csv.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the CSV (Command Separated Values) reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: DetectNumericColumns
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, the reader will detect numeric columns and create vtkDoubleArray or vtkIntArray for those instead of vtkStringArray.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseStringDelimiter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether to use the string delimiter.

IntVectorProperty.name: AddTabFieldDelimiter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates whether to add the tab character as a field delimiter to the list of other delimiter characters. This is needed since in the GUI the user can't enter a tab character.

IntVectorProperty.name: HaveHeaders
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If the value of this property is 1, treat the first line of the file as headers.

StringVectorProperty.name: FieldDelimiterCharacters
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists the characters that may be used to separate fields. For example, a value of "," indicates a comma-separated value file. A value of ".:;" indicates that columns may be separated by a period, colon or semicolon. The order of the characters in the text string does not matter.

IntVectorProperty.name: MergeConsecutiveDelimiters
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Whether to merge successive delimiters. Use this if (for example) your fields are separated by spaces but you don't know exactly how many.

SourceProxy.label: CSV Reader
SourceProxy.name: CSVReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a Delimited Text values file into a 1D rectilinear grid.
Documentation.short_help: Read a Delimited Text values file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The CSV reader reads a Delimited Text values file into a 1D rectilinear grid. If the file was saved using the CSVWriter, then the rectilinear grid's points and point data can be restored as well as the cell data. Otherwise all the data in the CSV file is treated as cell data. The default file extension is .csv as well as .txt. This can read file series as well.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. Each file is expected to be a csv file. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

ReaderFactory.extensions: csv tsv txt CSV TSV TXT
